knimeNode.name: ImzML Processed Loop Start
knimeNode.shortDescription: We use this node to read processed imzML into a DataTable.

fullDescription.intro: We rebin the every spectra's intensity to a new m/z which is specified by the user. It is the same rebinning algorithm used in the preprocessing node.

option.name: short name of first option (like in the dialog)
short name of second option (like in the dialog)
